body_html: I just took a shot at renaming TensorList to simply ArrayRef<Tensor>, but it's a pretty deep change in the codegen that doesn't make the resulting code more enjoyable than before. It's not something we really advertise in the public API, and if you look for the definition you'll find typedef ArrayRef<Tensor> TensorList; which indicates it's a reference
body_text: I just took a shot at renaming TensorList to simply ArrayRef<Tensor>, but it's a pretty deep change in the codegen that doesn't make the resulting code more enjoyable than before. It's not something we really advertise in the public API, and if you look for the definition you'll find typedef ArrayRef<Tensor> TensorList; which indicates it's a reference
body: I just took a shot at renaming `TensorList` to simply `ArrayRef<Tensor>`, but it's a pretty deep change in the codegen that doesn't make the resulting code more enjoyable than before. It's not something we really advertise in the public API, and if you look for the definition you'll find `typedef ArrayRef<Tensor> TensorList;` which indicates it's a reference
